meanings.definition: A device used for automatically signing a large number of documents.
meanings.sent1: The autopen quickly signed all the papers on the desk.
meanings.sent2: The CEO used the autopen to sign hundreds of letters in minutes.
meanings.sent3: The autopen decided to take a break and signed its own name on a piece of paper.
meanings.sent4: The autopen worked tirelessly, like a robot with a pen, signing document after document.
meanings.sent5: The autopen hummed as it smoothly signed each paper, never making a mistake.

meanings.definition: To sign a document using an autopen.
meanings.sent1: She autopens all her letters to save time.
meanings.sent2: The president autopens official documents to speed up the process.
meanings.sent3: He autopens his name so perfectly, it looks like a printed signature.
meanings.sent4: The machine autopens with precision, never missing a line.
meanings.sent5: They autopen every contract to ensure consistency and efficiency.
